PAINTING.LOOK: Pale skin chalk like face with a blunt nose intimidating as a viper with fluttering nostrils.

Cupboard.LOOK: Old shaggy wood with shredded corners eaten by the glumblebumbles but still intact.Opening it might present a big surprise

Sculpture.LOOK: Mighty Wizard with long hair,sharp claws and pointy teeth,the sculpture depicts one of the finest wizards of this school.There must be someone who follows his footsteps
